executable.title: fcsv_to_matlab (BRAINS)
executable.description: Convert a collection of fcsv files to a HDF5 format file

file.name: outputFile
file.label: Output HDF5 File
file.description: name of HDF5 file to write matrices into

file.name: landmarkTypesFile
file.label: Landmark Types File
file.description: file containing list of landmark types

string.name: landmarkGlobPattern
string.description: Glob pattern to select fcsv files
string.label: Landmark Glob Pattern

integer.name: numberOfThreads
integer.label: Number Of Threads
integer.description: Explicitly specify the maximum number of threads to use.
